step1.title: 1. Select floor plan image
step1.currentImage: Using current image ({{name}}). Upload a new file below to replace it.
step1.uploadHint: Upload a PNG, JPG, or SVG. The file stays local and is not saved with your project.

step2.title: 2. Calibrate scale
step2.instructions: Pick two points with a known distance directly on the image.
step2.warningSmallSpan: Calibration span is small – consider selecting points farther apart for better accuracy.

step3.title: 3. Position origin (optional)
step3.instructions: Pick a point on the image that should align with the origin in the editor. If you skip this step, the first reference point becomes the origin.
step3.clickHint: Click on the image to set origin

footer.storageNote: The plan image is only stored in your browser for this floor.

confirmRemove.title: Remove plan image
confirmRemove.description: Remove the plan image for {{floor}}? This cannot be undone.
